resume.professional_summary: Results-driven Senior Full-Stack & AI Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable backend systems and production-grade Al solutions[cite: 4]. Skilled in Python, FastAPI, multi-agent LLM architectures, and RAG/GraphRAG pipelines, LLM Factory, with expertise in prompt engineering and open-source model deployment[cite: 5]. Proven track record of reducing manual processes by 65%, cutting fraudulent claims by 13%, and boosting customer satisfaction scores[cite: 6]. Strong foundation in databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, PG-Vector) and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP), with hands-on experience in observability and monitoring (OpenLit, Prometheus, Grafana)[cite: 7]. Known for bridging backend engineering with advanced Al to deliver measurable business impact at scale.

work_experience.title: Product Engineer II
responsibilities: Built a production-grade AI HR screening tool using RAG/GraphRAG, Embeddings and Sentence Transformers and prompt optimization, reducing manual screening time by 60%.

Developed document intelligence Al assistants with optimised context memory (Mem0), RAG, Document Parsing(PyPDF, Tesseract, Docking), PG-Vector, Redis, and S3 storage, delivering 95%+ accurate query responses across large legal/HR docs.

Designed a multi-agent, multimodal diagnostic assistant with FastAPI + agent orchestration, applied prompt-tuning for domain-specific agents, cutting fraudulent claims by 13% and boosting CSAT from 3.8 to 4.2.
Automated claim filing with a custom multi-agent orchestration framework, fine-tuning open-source LLMs, reducing manual adjudication by 65% and improving customer turnaround times.
Established observability stack (OpenLit + Prometheus + Grafana) for Al pipelines, ensuring reliability, monitoring, and reproducibility.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led backend development & deployments, improving delivery speed by 37%.
Optimized databases & architecture, boosting API performance by 66%.
Integrated third-party platforms (Salesforce, Zendesk) and built automation tests (PyTest).
Partnered with clients to scope, design, and deliver projects, ensuring alignment with business needs.

work_experience.title: Solution Analyst
responsibilities: Spearheaded & Collaborated and coached 3 projects of different TechStack(Node.js, Django).
Delivered projects across Node.js, ASP.NET, Django, ensuring 100% on-time delivery.
Improved system performance metrics by 50% through architectural optimization while mentoring teams to follow SDLC best practices.
